chocolateCakes.name: Classic Chocolate Cake
chocolateCakes.description: A rich and moist chocolate cake layered with creamy chocolate frosting.

chocolateCakes.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
chocolateCakes.description: A decadent chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served warm.

chocolateCakes.name: Chocolate Mousse Cake
chocolateCakes.description: A light and airy chocolate mousse layered on a chocolate sponge base.

chocolateCakes.name: Chocolate Fudge Cake
chocolateCakes.description: A dense and fudgy chocolate cake topped with rich chocolate ganache.

chocolateCakes.name: Chocolate Cookie Cake
chocolateCakes.description: A giant cookie cake filled with chocolate chips and topped with frosting.

chocolateCakes.name: Chocolate Cheesecake
chocolateCakes.description: A creamy chocolate cheesecake on a graham cracker crust.
